alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 1:18PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Above 4000 feet, additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 10 above zero could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
